description:
Krillin must prove himself to both Gohan and Goku if he wants to enter the Tournament of Power. With martial arts tournament rules in play, Krillin’s strength isn’t solely based on his power level!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku, der Talentsucher! – Überrede Krillin und C18!
Scout Man Son Gokuu: Krillin to 18 Gou o Sasou
Son Goku the Recruiter Invites Krillin and No. 18
スカウトマン孫悟空 クリリンと18号を誘う
